title: Pilot
description: Homicide detectives Rita Lee Lance and Chris Lorenzo investigate the murder of a beautiful model and discover the ne'er-do-well son of a wealthy local resident is their prime suspect.

roles.char: Roxanne Dockweiler aka Roxy The Doxy

title: Going to Babylon
description: A dead call girl and the wealthy victim of an apparent heart attack send Rita and Chris undercover in the dark world of sexual appetites, as Rita must come to terms with her past.

title: S.O.B.
description: The mysterious death of a wealthy Palm Beach socialite leads Rita and Chris to a devious blackmail/extortion plot concocted by a charter boat captain and a prostitute.

title: In the Name of Love
description: When wealthy stockbroker Quentin Kirkland is found murdered with a bale hook through his chest, Rita's investigation uncovers a disagreement with his teenaged daughter Megan over her Cuban boyfriend, Ricky Vargas.

title: Men Seeking Women
description: A serial sex killer with a penchant for the personals forces Rita Lee Lance to put herself on the line so that she and Chris can stop him before he strikes again.

title: Dirty Laundry
description: When the naked body of a well-known congressman washes up near his beach front compound, Rita and Chris must expose the seamy past and sexual depravity of a prominent political family.

title: Hardcopy
description: The murder of a much despised tabloid newspaper publisher provides Chns and Rita with a wide array of suspects, but the case takes a surprising turn when the publisher's former mistress unexpectedly confesses to the crime.

title: Curtain Call
description: A high school girlfriend of Chris' becomes a suspect in the murder of an aging actress. Although he is convinced that his former girlfriend is innocent, he has difficulty dealing with the startling facts about the relationship between the two women.

title: The Brotherhood
description: A fraternity initiation results in the murder of a young coed.

title: Blo-Dri
description: Rita Lee Lance and Chris Lorenzo are not quite convinced that a double murder in a hairstyling salon is a mob hit, and their instincts ultimately prove to be correct.

title: Intensive Care
description: Lance and Lorenzo look beyond the bedside manner of a young society doctor when he is brutally murdered after a sexual encounter.

title: Squeeze Play
description: Rita is shocked to discover that her former lover, a major league baseball player, is suspected of murdering a club owner.

title: Shock Jock
description: When the live-in girlfriend of a popular and obnoxious radio personality is killed, Rita and Chris investigate the disturbed fan who admits to the murder.

title: The Sock Drawer
description: A police commander's sordid life forces him to murder one of his wife's "dates" in full view of Chns and Rita. He then manipulates an obnoxious D.A. and destroys certain evidence that could lead to the dismissal of Chris and Rita from the force.

title: Internal Affair
description: Chris is suspended for allegedly shooting an unarmed thief. His problems are further complicated when the victim's mother seeks revenge in a very unlikely manner.

title: Witness
description: Rita takes in a homeless young girl who has witnessed a brutal murder.

title: Domestic Agenda
description: Rita and Chris attempt to prove the innocence of a close ffiend of Rita's who has been made to seem insanely jealous by her psychatrist husband and is then accused of murdering her family's beautiful nanny with whom the husband had been having a clandestine affair.

title: Lady Luck
description: Rita and Chris go undercover to trap a killer who runs a string of illegal gambling casinos.

title: Working Girl
description: Chris becomes involved with a college prostitute as he and Rita attempt to solve the death of another.

title: Powder Burn
description: Hutch goes undercover as a Jamaican drug dealer in order to help Chris and Rita solve the vicious murder of a socially prominent young woman who was an innocent bystander at a drug rubout.

title: Baser Instincts
description: Rita and Chris go undercover on a movie set as film executives when a local film crew seems to be the target of militants.

title: Goodtime Charlie
description: A rapist returns to haunt Chris for sending him to jail.

title: Social Call
description: A Palm Beach society outcast is murdered as he is about to reveal something he says will rock the community. Chris and Rita go undercover to find out the secret.

title: Wild Card
description: Rita and Chris get involved when a wealthy over-sexed Palm Beach businessman puts out a contract on a smalltime loser who is partially responsible for the death of a woman in the businessman's well-paid harem.

title: In Too Deep
description: Chris and Rita investigate the murder of a vice cop, and Chris must deal with the victim's son -- who happens to be his godson.

title: Bad Blood
description: Two brothers are suspected of brutally murdering their parents. Chris and Rita learn that the younger brother was set up by a beautiful con-artist whose partner's greed triggered the murders.

title: Hot Rocks
description: Chris and Rita confront a bizarre burglary ring involving the mob, murder and Chris' quirky snitch Dunn.

title: Scorpio Lover
description: The murder of a wealthy Guatemalan businessman takes on serious international implications when Chris and Rita learn that his killer is a Guatemalan Army officer/hit man on the payroll of Central American drug lords.

title: Love-15
description: Chris and Rita investigate the murder of an up-and-coming young tennis champ's stepfather/coach who is seemingly involved with the mob.

title: The Queen Is Dead
description: Chris poses as a beauty pageant judge to find out who brutally murdered the pageant's most recent queen.

title: Irreconcilable Differences
description: The murder of a wealthy woman points toward her estranged husband.

title: Jasmine
description: The death of another female cop has a deep psychological effect on Rita. As part of her attempt to deal with her burnout, she reopens a forty year-old case.

title: Crush
description: When one of the troubled young men on the basketball team Chris coaches is found murdered, Chris and Rita begin an investigation that ultimately reveals that the victim was involved with not only his girlfriend but also with her stepmother.

title: Was It Good for You Too?
description: Chris and Rita discover that a deranged woman planning to kill her lover is really part of an elaborate scheme to cover up the murder of a wealthy resident.

title: Dead Weight
description: An investment advisors murder implicates his wife, a mistress and his personal trainer; Chris lusts after a hot car.

title: Kid Stuff
description: The romance between a devious and over-sexed 17-year-old girl and a prominent doctor gets out of hand when she murders the man's wife.

title: Night Games
description: A couple finds themselves in big trouble when their bizarre sex games go awry and a man is killed.

title: Meat Market
description: Rita goes undercover for the FBI to break up an international white slavery ring.

title: Star Signs
description: When a love triangle involving a phony astrologist ends in murder, Chris and Rita investigate.

title: Giant Steps
description: Chris and Rita investigate the drug overdose of a supposedly reformed addict who was a member of the Palm Beach aristocracy.

title: Soul Kiss
description: Chris and Rita pose as an engaged couple and attend a sex therapy clinic where a reporter was mysteriously killed.

title: Look the Other Way
description: Chris is wounded when he's set up for a hit man, and he and Rita reluctantly accept help from a local television reporter in tracking down a cofrupt judge and his high-powered father-in-law-to-be who tried to cover up one of the judge's earlier indiscretions.

title: Voices
description: Rita Infiltrates a phone sex operation to find a murderer.

title: Crime of Love
description: Although Rita objects, a gigolo/killer-turned-writer is released on parole into the custody of his publisher. When the publisher's oversexed wife is found murdered, Rita immediately suspects the parolee but later learns that he's innocent of this crime.

title: Team Spirit
description: Three fhends are stalked by a serial killer; Chris worries after turning to Cotton for help with a tax audit.

title: The Perfect Alibi
description: Chris falls for a suspected mob assassin.

title: To Serve and Protect
description: Rita and Chris must protect Donnie 'Dogs' Dibarto from a notorious mobster named Tony 'Toe Tag' Torino, when he attempts to muscle in on a piece of Dibarto's action and Dibarto decides to turn state's evidence. The situation gets further complicated when a Miami cop named Dexter, who's running the investigation on Torino and is suppose to be providing protection for Dibarto may or may not be on the up and up. When the hitters start getting too close, Rita and Chris must try and determine if Dexter is a 'dirty cop' or not.

title: Tough Love
description: Rita and Chris pursue a call girl killer.

title: Sex, Lies and Yellow Tape
description: A seductive ex-cop tries to blackmail some politically prominent lovers with a tell-all book.

title: Schemes Like Old Times
description: When a man is killed by an intruder, Chris and Rita investigate. They naturally turn their attention to the man's wife. But they later shift their focus on the man's assistant who lives with them. They learn that she's a criminal who's lying low, waiting for the statue of limitations on her crime to run out.

title: Love Never Dies
description: A young fashon model's drug overdose looks like murder.

title: Daddy Dearest
description: A sexually molested stepdaughter is suspected in the stabbing death of her father.

title: Ladies Night Out
description: A sexual extortion scheme turns to murder.

title: The Party's Over
description: A jealous wife arranges for her husband's girlfriend to be killed.

title: Killer Cop
description: The death of a "cop groupie" implicates dozens of uniformed officers.

title: T.K.O.
description: An up-and-coming boxer is accused of murdering his wealthy sponsor.

title: Judas Kiss
description: A drug investigation becomes complicated for Rita and Chris by the arrival of an old fiend -- and former lover.

title: Love Bandit
description: Rita refuses to believe that a good friend committed suicide.

title: Whore Wars
description: Rita and Chris investigate a deadly dispute between rival madams.

title: The Scarlet Shadow
description: After nearly losing her weapon while catching a dangerous criminal, Rita is taken off active duty to train at a facility in hand to hand combat for female police officers to avoid another dangerous situation. While there, she meets an old friend in the form of Robin Curry, a police officer with the Internal Affairs division of Palm Beach and the two catch up on old times. Robin seemed a little worried about something and tries to tell Rita during dinner but chooses not to. An hour or so later, Robin tries to call Rita up saying that she has to meet with her and so along with Chris, they go on the prowl to find her but are too late when Robin is found in a motel in her lingerie, cuffed and strangled to death. Things get personal for Rita at this point but her problems are just beginning when two officers from Special Investigations start asking sensitive questions about Rita's relationship with Robin, even suggesting that the two may have been lovers. Rita is shocked, appalled and extremely angry at the accusation and even more enraged when they suggest that Robin may have been crooked after $600,000 in evidence money turns up missing. Left high and dry and with no one else to turn to but Chris, Rita goes on a personal mission through the dark underworld of S&M in an attempt to fight for her rights as a cop and save the reputation of her deceased colleague who may have been murdered because Robin knew the truth behind who really stole the money...and who tried to set her and Rita up.

title: Head 'N' Tail
description: Rita and Lipschitz go undercover to investigate murders at a high school.

title: Freudian Slip
description: Chris' college classmate is accused of murdering his unfaithful wife.

title: The Last Campaign
description: Donovan's campaign for D.A. is caught up in a murder to cover corruption in city hall.

title: The Deep End
description: Chris and Lipschitz investigate the death of a porn magazine magnate.

title: Mother Love
description: A scheming stepmother seduces her husband's son in order to Inherit his fortune.

title: Dark Heart
description: While Rita is undercover with a new partner to catch a cop killer, Chris is stalked by an obsessed beauty who has a "If I can't have him, no one can" policy.

title: Natural Selection: Part 1
description: A serial luller stalks Palm Beach.

title: Natural Selection: Part 2
description: Rita's hunt for the sex killer continues; Chris is frustrated by his slow recovery.

title: Reluctant Witness
description: Chris and Rita must protect a difficult witness against mob retribution.

title: Maid Service
description: A young girl's murder exposes a deadly sex slavery ring.

title: Carrie & Jessie
description: A girl with multiple personalities is accused in the murder of her abusive mother.

title: Where There's a Will...
description: A jealous son is suspected in the murder of his wealthy and domineering father.

title: Red Flag
description: Atticus's new business venture results in an employee's murder.

title: Ask the Dust
description: A family's tragic past obscures the truth about the murder of its patriarch.

title: The Mud-Queen Murders
description: The murder of a female mud wrestler uncovers a deadly extortion scheme.

title: School of Hard Rocks
description: A faded rock star will stop at nothing to revive her sagging career.

title: Time Share
description: Rita and Chris suspect Donovan's young girlfriend is behind a deadly extortion scheme.

title: Vengeance
description: A corporate party gets out of hand and ends in murder; Captain Lipschitz leaves his wife to live with Chris.

title: Ghosts of the Past
description: An ex-prostitute finds she cannot escape her past; Chris and Jillian disagree over who should be paying for their dates.

title: Pas de Deux
description: Twin ballet dancers' complicated sexual liaisons are exposed when one of their husbands is murdered.

title: Mrs. Carlisle
description: A teenage boy is the prime suspect in the murder of an older woman' abusive husband.

title: Brother's Keeper
description: Rita's reunion with her foster brother is marred when he's suspected of murder.

title: Champagne on Ice
description: Captain Lipschitz is reunited with an old friend during an investigation of a private eye's murder.

title: I Know What Scares You
description: Chris is accused of failing to protect a young woman after a series of threatening phone calls escalates to murder.

title: New Blood
description: Chris's reprimand of an aggressive rookie detective leaves him facing a sexual harassment charge.

title: Community Service
description: Chris and Rita go after a.corrupt judge who is trading lenient sentences for sex.

title: Cadillac Jack
description: Rita investigates the murder of a friend who was having affair with the womanizing husband of a prominent state senator.

title: Into the Fire
description: The shooting and sudden disappearance of Eric draws Chris and Rita into a federal gun smuggling case.

title: Pulp Addiction
description: Jackie McMillian, a popular romance novelist, and her husband are suspected of murder.

title: The Lonely Hunter
description: While investigating the murder of a famous supermodel, Rita is wooed by the prime suspect.

title: Sweet Punishment
description: When a pimp is found murdered, Chris and Rita are lead to suspect a pair of women in his employ.

title: Friendly Persuasion
description: A murder threatens to expose a manicurist's extortion scheme.

title: Family Affairs
description: A murder uncovers a series of illicit affairs involving the victim's husband, her stepson and their beautiful housekeeper.

title: Tricks of the Trade
description: As Chris goes undercover to investigate the murder of a male prostitute, Capitan Lipschitz presses Rita to date his handsome godson.

title: Kill Shot
description: Chris and Rita investigate a murder on the women's pro volleyball circuit.

title: Partners: Part 1
description: While Rita partners with a Chicago detective on a high profile drug case,Chris must pull his own life together after the departure of his girlfriend.

title: Partners: Part 2
description: As their romance jeopardizes their partnership, Chris joins Rita in pursuit of a drug dealer's vengeful killer.

title: Glory Days
description: As their romance heats up, Chris and Rita investigate the murder of a young woman whose boyfriend is about to become a college basketball star.

title: Till Death Do Us Part
description: Chris and Rita marry while investigating a media tycoon's murder

title: The Last Kiss Goodnight
description: A sexual assault on Hilly exposes a dirty cop's dealings with a ruthless drug lord.

title: Dead Asleep
description: Holly struggles to keep an old acquaintance from being charged in a drug related homicide

title: Sudden Death
description: When a cheerleading candidate is murdered, evidence points to the team's dueling quarterbacks.

title: Uncivil Wars
description: The murder of a record producer's estranged wife exposes a gangster's money laundering scheme

title: Black and Blue
description: Michael and Holly question a battered woman's story after her abusive husband is murdered

title: Exit Dying
description: Holly goes undercover as an actress to solve a theater star's death.

title: Prey of the Fox
description: A fashion model's murder uncovers a noted lawyer's clever extortion scheme.

title: Playing Doctor
description: Holly and Michael are sent undercover to a drug rehab clinic in search of a deadly killer

title: Family Values
description: In the midst of his campaign for governor, a politician's son is accused of murder.

title: Private Dancer
description: A man who was going to turn his money to his wife leaving his children out is killed. And naturally the investigation focuses on the children.

title: Body Electric
description: After saving a neighbor from her violent ex-husband, Michael finds himself being accused of murder.

title: Runway Strip
description: Palm Beach homicide detectives Tom Ryan and Cassy St. John suspect that a Navy test pilot death in a plane crash was no accident.

title: Compulsion
description: After arresting a woman for the murder of her business partners, Tom and Cassy uncover evidence that she may have been framed.

title: Divorce, Palm Beach Style
description: While investigating the murder of a lawyer, Tom and Cassy come in contact with the judge who preside over their divorce, whom Tom thinks was unfair when he presided.

title: When She Was Bad
description: A murder exposes a secret society of wealthy wives who get their kicks through crime

title: Pre-Judgement Day
description: A men's magazine king is a suspect in the car bomb murder of his wife and business partner.

title: Loyalty
description: Cassy arrests the District Attorney's lobotomized son for murder.

title: Talk Dirty to Me
description: The murder of a popular sex talk show host uncovers her hidden past

title: Services Rendered
description: A gubernatorial candidate is impilcated in the murder of a handsome male prostitute.

title: Partners in Crime
description: When a tabloid newspaper reporter stumbles onto a murder scheme, her reputation keeps Tom and Cassy from believing her story.

title: Elective Surgery
description: Tom stalks a Idler seeking to avenge her own disfiguring injuries from a car accident by killing those responsible.

title: Appearances
description: Cassy suspects a jealous wife in the murder of her successful record producer husband.

title: Blue Collars
description: Cassy's sister witnesses a mob hit and becomes the killer's next target.

title: Peak Experience
description: The murder of a motivational speaker points to his competition as the guilty party.

title: The Babysitter
description: Cassy investigates the death of a teenage boy she used to baby-sit.

title: Pumped Up
description: The murder of a dead gym owner points to her wealthy fiancee and a former business pastner.

title: callme@murder.com
description: Tom and Cassy pursue a serial killer whose victims are culed From the Internet,

title: Exit the Dragon
description: After a former partner she accused of corruption is killed, Cassy suspects his involvement in the theft of $10 million.

title: Pink Elephants
description: As a pair of wealthy brothers elaborate plan to inherit their disabled mother's fortune go awry, a disgruntled alcoholic police sergeant takes a contract out on Harry's life.

title: Three Weeks of the Condor
description: A cadaver found in a film producer's bed leads Tom and Cassy to investigate a string of suspicious deaths.

title: I Love the Nightlife
description: Tom and Cassy investigate a series of murders that appear to be the work of a vampire.

title: The Rock
description: The death of a military academy's only female cadet appears to be murder.

title: Pretty in Black
description: Tom questions the story of a woman whose husband was murdered by a gang of art thieves.

title: Silent Witness
description: A voodoo priest whose spell has driven an acolyte to murder now threatens Cassy.

title: Ladies Man
description: Tom and Cassy's investigation of an FBI agent's murder is hampered by a pair of secretive and uncooperative federal agents.

title: Dirty Little Secrets
description: Tom and Cassy investigate the death of a prep school srudent whose blackmail scheme led to his murder.

title: A Question of Faith
description: Tom and Cassy disagree over a psychic who claims to have knowledge of a murder.

title: Fevers
description: Tom and Cassy investigate the murder of a popular Cuban businessman.

title: Guilt by Association
description: As he and Cassy investigate the mysterious death of a newlywed couple, Tom seeks advice on gening back into the dating game

title: Night of the Parrot
description: Tom and Cassy are called in to investigate the mysterious deaths of a wealthy woman's pets.

title: Air-Tight Alibi
description: A murder investigation uncovers evidence of a political assassination about to take place in Palm Beach. Cassy investigate a murder

title: Family Affair
description: The investigation of an apparent car accident uncovers a murder scheme.

title: Child's Play
description: Tom and Cassy set out to acquit a close friend who's been accused of murder.

title: The Wedge
description: Cassy is ostracized by her fellow cops when she's assigned to investigate a detective's shooting of his wife.

title: Pirates of Palm Beach
description: A private investigator's death while scuba diving leads Cassy and Tom to pirates salvaging sunken treasures.

title: Slip-Up
description: Tom and Cassy expose a man who staged a shark attack in order to murder his wife.

title: Rage
description: Tom is intimidated by an old football teammate who's helping with a murder investigation.

title: Teacher's Pet
description: Tom and Cassy's investigation a prep school teacher's apparent suicide uncovers his affair with a srudent.

title: Sea of Love
description: Tom and Cassy uncover a murder victim's search for her sister's rapist.

title: Total Eclipse
description: The death of a research scientist draws Tom and Cassy into a secret project searching for extraterrestrial life.

title: Three Ring Circus
description: A pair of Miami Beach detectives try to protect an important witness from being killed by his mob boss.

title: The Party
description: Cassy goes undercover to bring down a prison warden who's selling inmates into sexual slavery.

title: Ramone, P.I.
description: After becoming a licensed private detective, Ramone's first case stumbles into a murder.

title: Escorting Disaster
description: A prostitute's murder uncovers a blackmail scheme.

title: Genius
description: Cassy is framed for the murder of her ex-boyfriend by a deranged man seeking revenge.

title: Do You Believe in Magic?
description: A woman's split personality gives life to a murderous ventriloquist's dummy.

title: If the Shoe Fits
description: Tom and Cassy' s investigation into the murder of a TV news director leads them to suspect both a prominent reporter and her assistant.

title: Passion and the Palm Beach Detectives
description: Tom and Cassy pursue a well known romance novelist who they suspect in a string of murders.

title: All the World's a Stage
description: A popular actress Tom and Cassy are told to help study for a new film role interferes with their investigation of an immigrant' s murder

title: Forever
description: When Tom is shot to keep him from testifying in a murder trial, Cassy goes undercover to catch the man who ordered it.

title: Hidden Agenda
description: Lipschitz's first love turns up dead after asking him for protection from an aging mobster.

title: Sins of the Mother
description: Tom and Cassy expose an IRS agent's apparent suicide as murder.

title: Fear and Loathing in Palm Beach
description: A suicide investigation exposes a noted therapist's conspiracy to murder his wife.

title: The Loneliest Number
description: An investigation of a wanted killer's suicide leads Cassy to uncover the dead man's relationship with her mother.

title: Dead Again... and Again
description: After saving a mystery woman from an attack, Tom is drawn into a plot to kill her wealthy husband.

title: Behind the Music
description: Tom and Cassy investigate a series of murder attempts on a pair of conntroversial vee-jays.

title: Honor Among Thieves
description: A local artist is murdered during the theft of an Old Master's priceless drawing.

title: Strange Bedfellows
description: Cassy's investigation into a hit and run death leads to aU. S. Senator's suicide.

title: It's the Great Pumpkin, Harry
description: Harry tries to avoid his wife's annual Halloween costume party, only to end up in deep trouble himself.

title: Killer App
description: The investigation into a software developer's murder leads Tom and Cassy to a ruthless brother and sister team of venture capitalists.

title: Dance Fever
description: The investigation into the murder of a Latin dance champion points to his girlfriend and ex-partner.

title: Cook's Tour
description: A chef's sudden death on the eve of a lucrative cooking contest lead Tom and Cassy to investigate.

title: Where and When
description: As she and Tom investigate the murder of a famous race car driver's wife, Cassy recalls memories of a past life.

title: A Clockwork Florida Orange
description: Tom and Cassy's investigation into the murder of convenience store owner exposes a power hungry high school student's vengeful scheme.

title: Dream Weavers
description: A group of determined young college graduates extort wealthy businessman through promises to fulfill their wildest sexual fantasies.

title: Noir: Part 2
description: Tom finds he's been set up as he struggles to clear his name in a murder investigation.
